title: A $15 Bluetooth Speaker That Sounds Good and Lasts 80 Hours
description: We round up five great wireless models—across the price spectrum—to get your parties going this summer

title: Lyft to Cut at Least 1,200 Jobs in New Round of Layoffs
description: The latest cuts could impact 30% or more of the ride-sharing company’s more than 4,000 employees.

title: Elon Musk Sows Confusion on Twitter After Removing Legacy Check Marks
description: Kim Kardashian and Oprah lost their checks, LeBron James kept his and the NYC government account got impersonated.

title: Apple Plans Journaling App in Boost of Health Initiatives
description: A product that lets users keep track of their daily activities will compete with existing software.

title: U.S. Begins Planning for 6G Wireless Communications
description: The White House will meet Friday with corporate, government and academic experts to begin developing goals and strategies for 6G communications technology.
